column2: You went back to your host family's house and say ただいま。(tadaima), what does your host mother say back to you?
You accidentally stepped on someone's foot on the train, what do you say?
You are meeting someone for the first time, what do you say?
column3: よろしくおねがいします yoroshiku onegaishimasu
column4: よろしくおねがいします yoroshiku onegaishimasu
column5: ありがとうございます arigatou gosaimasu

column2: How do you say "half past three"?
How do you say "twenty years old"
How do you say "one year old"?
How do you say "ten years old"?
How do you say "fourth year student"?
